com.jcabi.s3

Interface Region

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CdRegion, MkRegion, Region.Simple, ReRegion

    @Immutable
public interface Region
    Amazon S3 abstraction.

    To get an instance of this interface, instantiate Region.Simple, for example: 

     Region region = new Region.Simple(key, secret);
 Bucket bucket = region.bucket("my.example.com");
 bucket.remove("README.txt");
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    $Id: 74aaecf13859b53d24e9d94c163314838eff1160 $
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
